mapper.select: select d.dept_cd as deptCd, dept_nm as deptNm, ofc_telno as ofcTelno, mngr_id as mngrId, m.flnm as flnm, dept_nope as deptNope from departments d, members m where d.mngr_id = m.member_id order by deptNm asc
mapper.insert:
select member_id from members m where m.flnm=#{department.flnm}
insert into departments (dept_nm, dept_cd, ofc_telno, mngr_id) values (#{department.deptNm}, #{department.deptCd}, #{department.ofcTelno}, #{member_id})
mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_CD as "deptCd", DEPT_NM as "deptNm" FROM DEPARTMENTS
